channel.title: Unreal 2
channel.description: Chat about Unreal II and its XMP add-on.

item.title: Hello!

item.content:encoded: I was reading about the new Unreal Tournament announcement today, and started feeling a bit nostalgic, so I thought I'd stop by to say Hi!

item.title: XMP discord group
item.author: invalid@example.com ((GR)Killer)
item.dc:creator: (GR)Killer
item.content:encoded:
https://discord.gg/gTSjC

Join us, let's get everyone together and talking. Discord is like IRC and has a good voice chat. Can also be run using your phone, on your desktop, or via a webpage.

Local Korean release only. Comes with the usual 3 CDs but also with the UT2004 demo on a separate CD. I picked up 2...one for opening and...

item.title: XMP USA Players for the Hall of Fame
item.author: invalid@example.com (BlueX)
item.dc:creator: BlueX
item.content:encoded:
XMP North American Players for the Hall of Fame

Hey guys this is mainly for the olllllllllllllllllllld xmpers that played with the best players that they ahd ever seen. I thinkin of players from nbk, omni, [pet], shadow, de, LNS, vd etc. Please take this very seriously and take any scrims and ladder matches into account. Euro players may comment as well but this is the USA hall of fame so please do not feel dismissed or offended for the exclusion, the respect for you is as players...

XMP USA Players for the Hall of Fame

item.title: Unreal 2 Doesn't Load Full Screen on Windows 10
item.author: invalid@example.com (Freddie)
item.dc:creator: Freddie
item.content:encoded:
View attachment 103447

Hi,

I recently installed Win10 upgrade on my computer. The installation went well, but Unreal 2 doesn't launch full screen, though it runs nicely otherwise with a narrow band at the top and at the bottom. The bands are about the size of a normal task bar. See the picture.

The Unreal 2.ini and the options in the game are both set to run full screen. I see no other setting options for this situation. It ran full screen in my former Windows 8.1 system before...

Unreal 2 Doesn't Load Full Screen on Windows 10

item.title: I'd like to blow a whistle...

item.content:encoded:
On some of the never used unreal 2 music....

This is about the Underwater levels/shian levels cut music..
The below is a quote from e-mail I've sent to someone:

Listen to this:


Part of that song is included in the credits theme of other m, even though changed up slightly.

However the true nature of the music is somewhere else, it wasn't even made for Unreal 2 to begin with and they simply used it as comptemporary music and with the levels cut, they...

I'd like to blow a whistle...

item.title: game freeze / stutters
item.author: invalid@example.com (megaman951)
item.dc:creator: megaman951
item.content:encoded:
hello. I just started to play Unreal 2 on steam. Everything works fine but the game keeps freezing for about 2 seconds every now and then, like it's trying to load something. I just finished the "acheron" level and now the game crashes while playing the cutscene

I'm using Windows 7 x64

item.title: Xbox version resources?
item.author: invalid@example.com (takwu)
item.dc:creator: takwu
item.content:encoded:
I've been looking at the Unreal2 and XMP (for Windows) uscripts recently, and found that there are a whole lot of differences. Not too surprising, considering the time between the last U2 patch and the XMP release.*

But then I wonder if that's also the case for the Xbox version. Do the two games run on different engine builds? Does Unreal2 still use Golem and XMP use Unreal Mesh?

Does anyone here have an Xbox? Can we somehow get the resources like the Unreal Scripts and Mesh files...

Xbox version resources?

item.title: original XMP Splashes and XBOX load screens
item.author: invalid@example.com (Leo(T.C.K.))
item.dc:creator: Leo(T.C.K.)
item.content:encoded:
I uploaded the original u2xmp splash screens because u2xmp community edition had them replaced and it's good to have a variety and remind on the originals:
U2XMPSplashes.rar

Here are all the loading screens from the XBOX version, adding this since they are unique:
XBOXLoadingScreens.rar

item.title: XBOX MAPS
item.author: invalid@example.com (Leo(T.C.K.))
item.dc:creator: Leo(T.C.K.)
item.content:encoded:
XBOXMaps.rar

Those come from the Unreal 2 Disc. Many of them couldn't be opened and crashed and some crashed with render error which could be fixed by rebuilding lighting, the ones renamed to XBOX in filename are such. Others have been saved on a version incompatible with the current pc one and as such couldn't be loaded, having errors like bad name index, file EOF errors etc etc. Several maps have missing texture...

XBOX MAPS

item.title: scaling terrain?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Ozma777)
item.dc:creator: Ozma777
item.content:encoded:
I can't get unreal2 editor to actually scale a terrain I built. UT2004 is the same. Is it NOT possible to scale brushes in Unreal2? I need to brush scale x=3 y=3 z=9. When I do it, it shows it scaled correctly in editor, but in game it's still 1x1x1. I could maybe use terraedit and scale=1152 and x=192 y=192, but I am pretty sure that if terraedit does NOT crash with that type of scaling. Unreal 2 editor WILL crash.

Is there any way to get the game to brush scale correctly in game?

item.title: The .con files
item.author: invalid@example.com (Leo(T.C.K.))
item.dc:creator: Leo(T.C.K.)
item.content:encoded:
How to open them again? What's the preferred method? A plugin for vlc player/media player/xmplay could do.

It's been a while since I opened/exxtracted them and I'd like to refresh my memory.

item.title: The Hell mission
item.author: invalid@example.com (Leo(T.C.K.))
item.dc:creator: Leo(T.C.K.)
item.content:encoded:
I've had lately a dream of playing a pre release version of Unreal 2 which had the Hell mission continue after you get the artifact(presumably). However there were now Skaarj entering the base and Mercenaries(the U2 human ones, not the mercs from Unreal).
There was a collapsed bridge/part like in other parts of the complex, but this time this area that got revealed had water pumps/plain water instead of the toxins. You had to drop down there if you wanted to get to the other side, but there...

The Hell mission

item.title: Damage
item.author: invalid@example.com (Leo(T.C.K.))
item.dc:creator: Leo(T.C.K.)
item.content:encoded:
Damage was U2 mod/total conversion, this is the only surviving link now:
http://fileplanet.com/137511/download/Damage
Could someone mirror this?

item.title: Solaris Base by Matthias Worch
item.author: invalid@example.com (takwu)
item.dc:creator: takwu
item.content:encoded:
Anyone tried Solaris Base for Unreal2?

It's an "unfinished" level by Matthias Worch (one of the people that made Unreal2, and the models that were later used in Sirocco).

The level is very short, but it sure is an Unreal2 level. Just another bit of "what Unreal2 could be".

Attached quite a few screenshots. and here's the homepage:
http://www.worch.com/?p=156

item.title: Any of the old XMP people around ?
item.author: invalid@example.com (DarkGeneral13)
item.dc:creator: DarkGeneral13
item.content:encoded:
Hello gamers,

I used to play XMP back in 2004, soooo many memories of fun & killing time
Would love to hear from anyone from those days. I used to be in a guild called DCSB & we used to compete in a tournaments, not sure where anyone is tbh. I also made a simple xmp video back then.....man that was long time ago.

Any links or just hello from the players from then would be appreciated

DG
